title: WALL-HUMPING RABBINICAL SORCERER üêç "THERE IS NO CATEGORY CALLED AMERICANS"
text:
Source: https://gab.com/SonsofGod/posts/111971206610418112
Thumbnail: https://gab.com/SonsofGod/posts/111971727238408756
Wall-humping rabbinical sorcerer: "There is no category called Americans"
‚ÑπÔ∏è Jewish rabbi and foreskin peddler, David Wolpe, takes a break from practicing the art of wall molestation to make a special announcement stating, "There's no category called "Americans". America is composed of a melange [mixture], a salad, a mosaic of different groups".
Rabbi Wolpe, perhaps suffering from temporary memory loss or amnesia, forgot to mention that his people are responsible for making that salad. Maybe it slipped his mind. Wolpe also says that America is a very hateful place where anti-Semitism grows for no reason other than jealousy. He adds that Jews are at the forefront of every (((movement))) but just as he's about to explain why, his momentary amnesia strikes again. Of course, there's no causation between what Jews do and why people hate them. 1.5 billion people simply woke up one day and hated Jews, for no reason at all.
üîö
Sidenote: Ignore the "knowmorenews" label. It refers to the unbelievably sick crypto Jew dog, Adam Green, who pretends to be Aryan. In case you missed his blatant anti-Christian sorcery, his Jewish last name, his trips to Israel or even who he has on his shows, this inferior Jew even claims that Jews invented Christianity to dupe Christians. World class kikery. Just stay away for your own sake.
